name: Suspicious Certreq Command to Download
description: Detects a suspicious certreq execution taken from the LOLBAS examples, which can be abused to download (small) files
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Rr][Ee][Qq]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Rr][Ee][Qq]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Pp][Oo][Ss][Tt]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn]\.[Ii][Nn][Ii]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\certreq.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:CertReq.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\ \-Post\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-config\ * AND process.command_line:*\ http* AND process.command_line:*\ C\:\\windows\\win.ini\ *))`
